publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6596.1# Jackie Baillie: Caring for Carers—As an amendment to motion (S3M-6596) in the name of Linda Fabiani, leave out from "looks forward" to end and insert "; welcomes the input of the Lomond and Argyll Advocacy Service in making the conference such a success, and notes the forthcoming publication of the Scottish Government’s carers strategy." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-6596.1# Jackie Baillie: Caring for Carers—As an amendment to motion (S3M-6596) in the name of Linda Fabiani, leave out from "looks forward" to end and insert "; welcomes the input of the Lomond and Argyll Advocacy Service in making the conference such a success, and notes the forthcoming publication of the Scottish Government’s carers strategy." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S3M-6596.1# Caring for Carers (lodged on 30 June 2010) Elaine Murray*, Trish Godman*
